job_tasks.phrase: help train LLMs for text or multi-modal tasks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the core activity of training Large Language Models for specific tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: predicting emotion signals from different architecture choices of the adapted LLM
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of experimenting with and adapting LLM architectures to predict specific signals.

job_tasks.phrase: Take hypotheses, ideas or papers and create implementations of solutions on the back of these
job_tasks.justification: This implies the practical implementation and development of models based on research and theoretical concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Run experiments on the back of the created implementations that evaluate and verify hypotheses
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the iterative process of testing and validating model performance and hypotheses.

job_tasks.phrase: experience fine tuning LLMs with additional modalities
job_tasks.justification: Fine-tuning LLMs is a core modeling task, especially when incorporating multiple data types.

job_tasks.phrase: loves to code and build working systems
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on practical coding and system building beyond just theoretical model development.

job_tasks.phrase: experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions traditional software development lifecycle stages.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the development of robust, deployable code.
While pipelines can be operations, owning them in a development context points to building and maintaining them as part of the software lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Make sure we have correct pipelines in place to ingest data from existing processed data, text, voice and video and adjust granularity
job_tasks.justification: This describes building and managing data ingestion pipelines, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering practices for building maintainable and reliable code.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development of production-ready software and full-stack capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in finding and collecting appropriate data for the tasks.
job_tasks.justification: This involves the initial stages of data acquisition, which is part of the data pipeline.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyse and pre-process data if necessary.
job_tasks.justification: Data analysis and preprocessing are essential steps in preparing data for modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Our aim is to make video content creation available for all - not only to studio production!
job_tasks.justification: This describes the overarching business goal and vision for the product.

job_tasks.phrase: create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video
job_tasks.justification: This defines the core product and its aspirational qualities, linking technology to business value.
Owning production pipelines can encompass MLOps responsibilities, ensuring models are deployable and maintained.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
loves to code and build working systems
used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams
help a team of research engineers, scientists and linguists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs, including fine-tuning and developing applications around them for text-to-video generation. It requires building production-ready software and pipelines to support these generative models, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
